last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: Doubt is thrown upon the legitimacy behind Coleen Rooney's claims, while the Wags' husbands have a dispute to settle of their own. And as the trial draws to a close, we await the verdict...

name: Vardy v Rooney: A Courtroom Drama
original_name: Vardy v Rooney: A Courtroom Drama
overview: Dramatic recreation of the sensational 'Wagatha Christie' trial, the digital-age whodunnit based on the real-life events of Rebekah Vardy's bid to sue Coleen Rooney

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: As the trial begins, Rebekah Vardy is cross-examined by Coleen Rooney's opposition, but the last-minute withdrawal of an important witness provides an unforeseen twist to the tale...

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Doubt is thrown upon the legitimacy behind Coleen Rooney's claims, while the Wags' husbands have a dispute to settle of their own. And as the trial draws to a close, we await the verdict...
